function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Presence of SARS-CoV-2 RNA in wastewater samples indicating potential contamination and spread of COVID-19.","Impact":"Risk of community transmission and public health impact if untreated or unmonitored wastewater is released into the environment.","Mitigation":"Implementation of wastewater treatment processes, regular monitoring of wastewater for SARS-CoV-2 RNA, and public health awareness to reduce exposure.","Technologies":"Advanced wastewater treatment technologies, RT-qPCR testing, and public health communication strategies.","People":"General public, wastewater treatment personnel, public health authorities, and researchers.","Owner":"Wastewater treatment facilities, public health authorities, and researchers."}]}
